Key Match Events: The Royals beat the Yankees 4-2 in Game 2 of the ALDS.
Jazz Chisholm Jr. hit a solo homer in the ninth inning.
Bobby Witt Jr. made a crucial double play in the eighth inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Jazz Chisholm Jr. expressed confidence in winning the series.
Aaron Judge commented on the team's hard-hit balls that resulted in outs.
Aaron Boone discussed the challenges of hitting and expressed confidence in Judge.
